name: Drowsiness Detection SDK
items: Created an SDK to detect signs of drowsiness while a person was driving.

name: Latham Measurement
items: Created the application from scratch using SwiftUI to interact with a piece of specially designed hardware in order to control the movement of a laser and calculate measurements.

name: CSC Go
items: Implemented new functionalities including feature flags that allowed the company to adjust settings on the fly.
Integrated the Ayden and Stripe SDKs, eventually removed them and moved to Apple Pay
Added Adyen as a payment processor.

name: BlockFI
links: Due to bankrupcy of the company the app is no longer available.
items: Rewrote the React Native app using Swift and UIKit.

name: Legion Workforce Engagement
items: Maintained the app and implemented multiple features including a redesign of the home screen to match the web, the ability to request and cancel time off for employees.
Refactored much of the application to ease new feature testing and development.
Implemented multi language support.
Since I was the member with the most seniority in the team, I was tasked with performing code reviews, and decide much of the architecture for new features
technologies: Objective-C (for maintenance of a single module)

name: Sharetec
items: Started from scratch an app for mobile banking. Defined architecture and design patterns for the app.
Provided a flexible customization process that allowed the app to be a white label product.

name: Smartplate
items: Maintained the app and implemented a feature that allowed users to mark foods and meals as favorites.
Integrated a Bluetooth peripheral with the app.
Integrated Fitbit interaction. Fitbit provided information about sleep / calories burnt, and that was factored into the calculations regarding your diet.

name: MMM Members App
items: Built new app from scratch.
Focused on the networking layer implementation.
Support for font scaling based on user system preferences.

name: Paypocket
links: App no longer available in the AppStore
items: Built new app from scratch.
Added support for EMV cards, updated SDKs.

name: AMC Theaters
items: Implemented a caching system.
Refactored legacy code.
Developed prototypes like detecting movies based on the trailer audio, integration with Apple Wallet and iBeacons.
Integrated several signin methods using multiple social network platforms.
Revamped the whole analytics module in order to improved the data generated by users interaction with the app.

name: Payless ShoeStore
links: App no longer available in the AppStore
items: Built the application from scratch.
Integrated several social networks SDK into the app.
Added loyalty coupons support into Apple Wallet.
Added iBeacons support.

name: Trivia Crack / Preguntados
items: As part of the core team, my tasks included writing the networking layer and the foundations for the game.

name: Aworded / Apalabrados
items: Implemented a caching system and a local database with SQLite.
Updated the UI when we moved away from skeuomorphism (the style used prior to iOS 7).
Added several languages to the game, like Swedish and Turkish and Russian.
Integrated several ads frameworks.
Implemented functionality in an app with ten thousand daily users.
